name: Kokatat Gore-Tex Rogue Dry Top - Men's
description: Arguably the most technologically advanced drytop around. Tough yet supple, sexy yet utilitarian, it's a true blend of all things good.Body is GORE-TEX® 3.2oz. Evolution fabric.Side panels and sprayskirt tunnel are GORE-TEX XCR® for maximum breathability, comfort, and mobility.Dual-adjustable neoprene outer skirt incorporates hook-and-loop-compatible neoprene for unhindered stretch.Shoulders, elbows, and forearms are reinforced with GORE-TEX Cordura®.Self-draining Super Stretch neoprene neck and wrist cuffs.Self-draining chest pocket.
